org.strongback

Interface Logger


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface Logger
    A simple logging framework.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Logger.Level 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debug(String message)
      Log a message at the debug level.
      void error(String message)
      Log a message at the error level.
      void error(Throwable t)
      Log an exception at the error level.
      void error(Throwable t, String message)
      Log an exception and a custom error message at the error level.
      void info(String message)
      Log a message at the information level.
      static Logger noOp()
      Get a Logger implementation that does nothing with log messages.
      void trace(String message)
      Log a message at the trace level.
      void warn(String message)
      Log a message at the warning level.

    • Method Detail

      • error

        void error(Throwable t)
        Log an exception at the error level. The exception and message are logged only if error-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        t - the exception

      • error

        void error(Throwable t,
           String message)
        Log an exception and a custom error message at the error level. The exception and message are logged only if error-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        t - the exception
        message - the error message

      • error

        void error(String message)
        Log a message at the error level. The message is logged only if error-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message

      • warn

        void warn(String message)
        Log a message at the warning level. The message is logged only if warning-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        message - the warning message

      • info

        void info(String message)
        Log a message at the information level. The message is logged only if information-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        message - the message

      • debug

        void debug(String message)
        Log a message at the debug level. The message is logged only if debug-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        message - the message

      • trace

        void trace(String message)
        Log a message at the trace level. The message is logged only if trace-level (or higher) logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        message - the message

      • noOp

        static Logger noOp()
        Get a Logger implementation that does nothing with log messages.
        Returns:
        the no-operation logger; never null
